entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @RepLeeZeldin @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Feb. 28, 2020 - N. Charleston, S.C. - Trump accused Dems of “politicizing” the coronavirus during a campaign rally claiming it’s “their new hoax.” “The Dems are politicizing the coronavirus.” “They have no clue,” said Trump as he downplayed the deadly coronvirus to the country.
